xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DisclosureOfNotesOnFinancialR:
Notes for Cash Flow

Cash flows from operating activities
1. Adjustments for finance costs- This item includes "Finance and other income, net of finance costs".
2. Adjustments for decrease (increase) in other current assets - This item includes or decrease in both Current and Non-current Other Assets.
3. Adjustments for other financial assets, current - This item includes decrease (increase) in “Unbilled receivables” and “Contract assets”.
4. Adjustments for increase (decrease) in trade payables, current - This item includes increase (decrease) in “Trade payables, other liabilities and provisions”.
5. Adjustments for other current liabilities - This item includes increase (decrease) in “Contract liabilities”.
6. Adjustments for unrealized foreign exchange gains losses includes "Unrealised exchange (gain)/loss, exchange (gain)/loss on borrowings and loans to subsidiaries".
7. Other adjustments to reconcile profit (loss) - This item includes “Gain on sale of property, plant and equipment, net”.

Cash flows from investing activities
8. Other inflows (outflows) of cash includes “Proceeds from restricted interim dividend account”.
9. Cash flow used in obtaining control of subsidiaries or other business includes “Investment in subsidiaries”.

Cash flows from financing activities
10. Other inflows (outflows) of cash includes “Payment for deferred contingent consideration”.
xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DisclosureOfNotesOnAssetsAndL:
1. Property, plant and equipment includes “Property, plant and equipment” and “Right-of-Use assets”.
2. Other non-current assets – includes “Non-current tax assets (net)” and “Other non-current assets”.
3. Other current financial assets- includes “Derivative assets”, “Unbilled receivables” and “Other financial assets”.
4. Other current assets - includes “Contract assets” and “Other current assets”.
5. Other non-current financial liabilities – includes “Lease liabilities” and “Derivative liabilities”.
6. Other non-current liabilities – includes “Non-current tax liabilities (net)” and “Other non-current liabilities”.
7. Other current financial liabilities – includes “Derivative liabilities”, “Lease liabilities” and “Other financial liabilities”.
8. Other current liabilities – includes “Contract liabilities” and “Other current liabilities”.
